title: Who am I?
text: Hello, my name is Yevhen Yakymenko. I am 33 years old. I live in Ukraine.I was born in Kherson, where I lived until 2022. In 2022, because of the war, I was forced to move to Kyiv. One  day I realized that I needed to change something in my life, namely change my profession and do something radically  different.Therefore, having a great desire to learn something  new and develop, I signed up for courses at an IT school. This  is how my path in Web Development began.

title: Education and work experience
text: In general, I have a higher engineering education, a master's degree in the specialty: "Industrial and civil construction". But I did not work for a long time in my profession. My previous place of work was SKL Shipping Agency, LLC. Worked as forwarding agent / customs broker from 01.01.2015 until 24.02.2022.

title: Studying at an IT school and my skills
text: So, in 2021 I completed a course at the GoIT school in the direction Full Stack developer. This school gave me the basic knowledge and skills for successful work in Web Development. During my studies, I participated in student team projects, which gave me a deep understanding of web development and the processes that take place there. At the moment, I have the following basic skills: GIT, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Rest API, Java Script, React, React Hooks, React Router, Redux, Styled Components.

title: My qualities
text: I possess many of the qualities required to be a front-end software engineer. Responsibility, hard work, an analytical mindset, diligence, perseverance and ability to self-organize, perform routine tasks and work remotely belong to my personal strengths. I have a logical mindset, which makes me a great performer. I am also good at learning, working with people and finding compromises. At work, I am fully capable of immersing myself in tasks.

title: Hobbies and recreation
text: By nature, I am a kind, non-conflictual person. I like to travel, eat delicious food and active recreation in nature. I don't have bad habits. I don't drink alcohol and I don't smoke. I like to spend my free time with my family, my beloved wife and my little son. I also really like to make something from wood and metal. I have many different tools for this. In this, I am a jack of all trades.

title: Final word
text: In conclusion, I would like to wish you inspiration, development and fulfillment of your most cherished dreams. Thank you for reading to the end. All the best to you.
